name: BattleCON: Online
description: In this deeply strategic, full-information battle card game, choose your fighter from a diverse roster of spell-slinging duelists, tag-teaming werewolves, time-traveling boxers, dimensional knights, and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics (Cherry Trail) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.4ghz or above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB of VRAM Dedicated GPU. DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
